common.template.cms

Interface CmsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileBasedCmsService
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CmsService
    Service that provides page content, coming from some sort of Content Management System (CMS).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<java.lang.String>> get(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales, CmsIdentifier cmsIdentifier)
      Gets the content corresponding to the given CMS identifier for the first found given language.
      default java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String> getOrEmpty(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales, CmsIdentifier cmsIdentifier)
      Gets the content corresponding to the given CMS identifier for the first found given language.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<java.lang.String>> get(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales,
                                                                               CmsIdentifier cmsIdentifier)
        Gets the content corresponding to the given CMS identifier for the first found given language.
        Parameters:
        locales - the list of locales used to translate the message
        cmsIdentifier - identifier of the CMS entry field
        Returns:
        the completionStage of the content in the first found given language, or absent if it could not be found

      • getOrEmpty

        default java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String> getOrEmpty(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales,
                                                                          CmsIdentifier cmsIdentifier)
        Gets the content corresponding to the given CMS identifier for the first found given language.
        Parameters:
        locales - the list of locales used to translate the message
        cmsIdentifier - identifier of the CMS content
        Returns:
        the completionStage of the content in the first found given language, or empty string if it could not be found
